typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as integer,
		empname as string,
		skills as string,
		address as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> emp1data
emp1data parse(skillset = skills ? (skill1 as string,
		skill2 as string,
		skill3 as string),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: '|',
	nullValue: '') ~> skillsParse
skillsParse parse(address = address ? (city as string,
		country as string),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> AddressParse
AddressParse sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['parsedata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		empname,
		skill1 = skillset.skill1,
		skill2 = skillset.skill2,
		skill3 = skillset.skill3,
		city = address.city,
		country = address.country
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
